reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a classic piece with exceptional quality and color, noting it looks exactly as pictured.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Black Sweater Worth the Price
items.body: l personally think this is a great cardigan even though it was no pockets. l love the weave, sleeves perfect lenght, hits right below top of my hips, l think its medium to heavy weight. Fits perfect under my winter coat & prefect for the cooler spring temps here in the UpState SC. buttons typical, China needs to learn how to make correct size button hole, BUT not as bad as l have dealt with before. Can be dressed up for church or casual wear with jeans. l am 5'5" lbs Small fits well. have not laundried yet but l think if washed delicate in linen bag dried flat then air fluffed should be fine. Read more
items.author: Quiser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic sweater, giving a traditional look
items.body: I like the fit, very office appropriate but it can be dressed down with a nice tee. I wouldn't say it's soft but it isn't itchy or uncomfortable in anyway. It'll keep you warm. I really like this sweater and would buy a nother in a different color. At least I know where to get a sweater if and when I want another color. Pretty pleased with this purchase...no complaints. Read more
items.author: TellitLikitIs

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice wardrobe staple!
items.body: Great cardigan for layering in fall/winter months! Purchased in small, in the burgundy/wine color. It’s a brick red - more brownish red than a wine shade, but it’s a lovely color for fall and on trend. The buttons are a faux tortoiseshell and securely fastened. The material is soft to the touch and medium weight, not super thick but not very thin either. The sleeves and hem length are on the shorter side but I’m also tall so everything looks slightly cropped on me! Overall a solid layering cardigan for chilly days that I’d recommend picking up at a good price. Read more
items.author: AE

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, love the waffle knit
items.body: I love the waffle knit of this sweater, gives it some interest beyonda plain cardigan. I wore it as a sweater and it was comfortable, true to size. There was slight gapping between the lower buttons (like by my waist) when I sat down, especially if I tried to tuck it in. I was able to pair it with slacks for work. Would also look cute with jeans. Read more
items.author: Melanie Mader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and cozy
items.body: Very well made cable knit sweater. So many pretty colors to choose from. Button details are very nice. Got the coffee color which is an expresso color. Very pretty. Run a little generous. Ordered xlg could have gotten large. ❤️ Read more
items.author: Debbie Bauer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality!!
items.body: I love this sweater so much. It’s exactly what I was looking for. The quality is GOOD. The material is thick and warm, and the buttons are big and STURDY. I got this for work. It looks professional but can also be dressed in a more casual way. I want to buy more colors. Read more
items.author: Jacqueline

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down! But still fit didn’t work for me sadly
items.body: I originally bought this sweater in a medium but it fit big. I then purchased in a small and it was still bulky- length did not work for me either. I really wanted to love the fit because the quality is excellent and cotton! Read more
items.author: msk0823

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: Generously sized, nice fit. Very pretty and looks more expensive than it is. Good weight for fall and winter. Only problem was deciding what color since there were many to pick from. Read more
items.author: janices sensible shoes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Dark Green, Light Blue, Rose Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
